title: Project Initiation and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and success metrics. Gather requirements from stakeholders.

title: Design the Legal Precedent Predictor System
description: Create a high-level system design that outlines the architecture and interactions between components.

title: Define Machine Learning Model Architecture
description: Design the specific machine learning model architecture to be used for predicting legal precedents.
dependencies: Design the Legal Precedent Predictor System

title: Gather and Preprocess Data
description: Collect historical court decisions data, preprocess it, and prepare it for training.

title: Implement the Machine Learning Model
description: Develop and implement the machine learning model as designed.

title: Develop the Frontend Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for inputting court decisions data and visualizing predictions.

title: Integrate the Frontend and Backend
description: Combine the frontend and backend components into a working system.

title: Perform System Testing
description: Test the Legal Precedent Predictor system for functionality, usability, and performance.

title: Resolve Test Findings and Fix Issues
description: Address any issues found during testing and ensure that the system meets requirements.

title: Security Review and Implementation
description: Ensure the Legal Precedent Predictor system is secure and follows best practices for data protection.
dependencies: Resolve Test Findings and Fix Issues

title: Deploy the Legal Precedent Predictor System
description: Prepare the system for production deployment, including setting up monitoring and alerts.

title: Document the Legal Precedent Predictor System
description: Create documentation for developers, users, and stakeholders.
dependencies: Deploy the Legal Precedent Predictor System
